head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PURCELL, JAMES Q.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PURCELL, JAMES Q.

block.p: PURCELL-James Q. On July 25, 2000, of Glen Oaks, NY. Husband of Judith B. Graham-Purcell. Father of Paul, Penny, Casey and the late Patrick. Also survived by two granddaughters. Visiting in the Doyle B. Shaffer Inc. Funeral Home, Little Neck Pkwy and Northern Boulevard, Little Neck, NY on Saturday, 7-9PM. Religious services on Saturday at 8PM. Interment private.
